title: Close prediction on BotRK changes

embed.description: The PBE has been updated! As we continue the 7.11 PBE cycle, tonight's update includes changes! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning : PBE Content is tentative and subject to change - what you see below may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers at the end of the cycle!

body:
>Blade of the Ruined King
>Unique Passive's target's current health on hit increased from 4% to 6%
>[VS PBE: from 4% to 6%]
>[VS LIVE: from 8% to 6%]
>Unique Passive's Effect changes from [doubled for melee] to a flat [8%]
>Unique Active Minimum bonus physical damage lowered from 20 to 15

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/FesAGUAG-pbe-yasuo-nerf-and-bork-balanced-around-meleeranged-champs?comment=0009

I was soooo close.

replies.body: Yeah, 4% would have been way too harsh a nerf...
